            RECONST. PROJ.,TF020891-ST. PETERSBURG CENTER CITY REHABILITAION

abstracts.cdata!:
The primary objective of the Emergency
            Reconstruction Project is to assist the Government in
            restoring production levels, by easing some of the critical
            physical constraints caused by war-related damage.  The
            project will provide funds for: 1) the replacement of
            critical road maintenance equipment and spare parts lost
            during the war; 2) priority items for railways; 3) power
            transmission interconnection in order to assure a reliable
            power supply to the Zadar area and the reconstruction of the
            Dubrovnik area power distribution networks; 4) water supply,
            sewerage and flood control; 5) community reconstruction
            component by providing assistance to homeowners in priority
            communities that have sustained substantial damage, in order
            to facilitate the return of people to their homes; 6)
            assistance in rebuilding the national herds for milk and
            meat production; partial replacement of lost tractors and
            motor cultivators for private farmers; and limited
            replacement of grain dryers; and 7) reconstruction
            activities in additional areas where the Government
            currently does not have full access.
